Quality, translation, editing, typesetting, encoding - everything was of a consistently high standard.

good.

Solid work and a fine substitute in light of Ecliptic-BSS dropping.
Next best after BSS. Good work guys!

Actually the only good choice now because of Ecliptic-BSS dropping it, Frostii being only decent for this series and Koharubi being really slow. They did a really good job, but the karaoke was way to flashy.

Clear, precise subs. Timing is exellent.
Nice typesetting and good quality overall.
Beautifully phrased, no grammer or spelling errors, and clean typesetting. The BEST!!!
